title: Somali Youth Mentorship
text: This website was created for the sole purpose of introducing the world to the flight of the Somali youth. I will continue to develop this website. Bear with me.

section.title: Why Antd? (currently under development)
section.content: Ant Design is a React UI library that has a lot of easy-to-use components for building elegant UI.

section.title: Why styled-components? (currently under development)
section.content: Styled Components gives you total control over your components.
